thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: Diedra Nufong

author: Diedra Nufong
title: Diedra Nufong
text: Esurranty really knows how to treat me. I dropped my s6 and the front the back shattered. I submitted a claim online and within a few minutes after I sent in the firms I received an email with my repair options. They even offered to overnight a loaner phone to me. Since I have my old phone I didn't need it but it's a good offer. Esurranty paid for overnight shipping and I had my phone back in 3 days looking just like new. I have been with them for 4 years and never had a problem. I would highly recommend esurranty to anyone that is looking for great cell phone insurance from great people.
